pages.text: Saturating Condensers are part of the $(l:multiblocks/turbine)Industrial Turbine$(/l) multiblock.$(p)Saturating Condensers are requried if you wish to condense the used-up steam back into water. This is especially great for $(l:multiblocks/fission)Fission Reactors$(/l), where insufficient water may be an issue.
Each Saturating Condensers adds 64,000mB to your $(l:multiblocks/turbine)Industrial Turbine's$(/l) max water output.
